description: Numerators of poly-Bernoulli numbers B_n^(k) with k=2.
links: M. Kaneko, Poly-Bernoulli numbers, Journal de Théorie des Nombres de Bordeaux, 9 no. 1 (1997), Pages 221-228.
Masanobu Kaneko, Poly-Bernoulli numbers, Journal de Théorie des Nombres de Bordeaux, 9 no. 1 (1997), Pages 221-228.
Index entries for sequences related to Bernoulli numbers.
mathematica: k = 2; Table[Numerator[(-1)^n Sum[(-1)^m m! StirlingS2[n, m]/(m + 1)^k, {m, 0, n}]], {n, 0, 27}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Oct 28 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
